name: DevOps Engineer
description:
Team Xsolla is in search of two DevOps Engineers for two different teams - DevOps Team and Observability and Delivery Team. If you are ready for a challenge, then join our team and up your game!

Xsolla Technology Stack: Ubuntu, Docker, Kubernetes, Harbor, Gitlab, Terraform, Terragrunt, Puppet, Nginx, Google Cloud Platform, Prometheus, Grafana, New Relic and ELK

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Manage Kubernetes clusters (self-hosted or cloud-based)

  • Implement and maintenance infrastructure in the cloud

  • Managing Linux servers, web servers and application servers

  • Troubleshooting

RESPONSIBILITIES (Observability and Delivery Team)

  • Assistance to development teams in creating, optimising deployments (Gitlab) and solving problems

  • Develop and maintain Xsolla Observability stack (Multiple Prometheus servers, Zabbix, Newrelic, ELK)

  • Everything-as-a-code approach

  • Monitor systems performance in a production environment

  • Internal tools developing

  • Troubleshooting

REQUIREMENTS

  • At least 3 years experience as a DevOps engineer

  • Extensive experience with Linux

  • Extensive experience with container orchestration using Kubernetes

  • Experience with Self-hosted Kubernetes clusters administration

  • AWS or GCP cloud experience

  • Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code tooling

  • Experience with Python / Bash scripting

  • Experience with observability tools

  • Experience with CI/CD

  • Excellent interpersonal communication skills

  • Strong communication skills

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

  • English level B1 and higher

  • IT professional certifications are not required, but it will be a plus

  • Kubernetes (CKA, CKS)

  • Google Cloud Platform or AWS

  • HashiCorp (Terraform Associate, Vault Associate)

  • Linux (LFCS, LFCE, RHCSA, RHCE)

  • Puppet or Ansible certifications

ABOUT XSOLLA

Xsolla is the video game commerce company, powered by Transaction Engine and Business Engine, that helps developers and publishers market, sell, connect and optimize their games globally. The engines work seamlessly together to solve the complexities of distribution, marketing and monetization so partners can increase their audience, sales and revenue.
